name: MusicFlow
description:
This is my submission for the 2020 GTMK Game Jam "Out of Control":

MusicFlow:

Controls : Arrow keys

The game difficulty ramps up quickly to provide some very challenging thinking and platforming

Music may seem to move you unexpectedly, but if you flow with it you can reach further.

The game is inspired by platformers like Celeste and Super Meat Boy , with a electronic soundtrack that directly effects the challenge but also empower you.

The game contains timer for highscore and a secret token to collect.

If you played and enjoyed the game , I would like to see your scores in the comments
